SEARCH
Package main

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
main.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Manages a list of financial transactions and provides methods for adding, retrieving, and analyzing them (e.g., filtering and calculating balance).

      Adds a transaction to the internal transaction list.

    • getAllTransactions

      public List<Transaction> getAllTransactions()
      Returns the list of all recorded transactions.
      Returns:
      A list of transactions.

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Calculates the current balance by summing income and subtracting expenses.
      Returns:
      The calculated balance.

    • filterByType

      public ArrayList<Transaction> filterByType(TransactionType type)
      Filters transactions by their type (INCOME or EXPENSE).
      Parameters:
      type - The transaction type to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of transactions of the given type.

    • filterByDateRange

      public ArrayList<Transaction> filterByDateRange(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Filters transactions that occurred within a specific date and time range.
      Parameters:
      from - The start of the date range (inclusive).
      to - The end of the date range (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of transactions within the specified range.

    • filterByAmountRange

      public ArrayList<Transaction> filterByAmountRange(double from, double to)
      Filters transactions within a specified amount range.
      Parameters:
      from - The minimum amount (inclusive).
      to - The maximum amount (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of transactions whose amounts fall within the range.

    • filterByCategory

      public ArrayList<Transaction> filterByCategory(Category category)
      Filters transactions by a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of transactions that match the specified category.

    • filterByKeyword

      public ArrayList<Transaction> filterByKeyword(String keyword)
      Filters transactions based on a keyword found in the description.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for (case-insensitive).
      Returns:
      A list of transactions whose description contains the keyword.
